**Tender Announcement: Janitorial Services for RCMP Boissevain Detachment** [English | Français]
============================================== [English | Français]

**Reference:**
PW-23-01020225

**Publication Date:** 5 January 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** 3 February 2023 at 15:00 hours (WCS)

**Contract Description:** The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites contractors to submit bids for janitorial services at the RCMP Boissevain Detachment in Manitoba. The contract will require provision of labor, materials, equipment, transportation, and daily site supervision for a period of two years, with an option to extend for up to three additional one-year periods.

**Security Requirements:** This solicitation contains security requirements. Please see the Tender Documents for details.

**Basis of Selection:**

* A bid must be responsive to all requirements outlined in the Tender Documents.
* The bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for contract award.

**Tender Requirements:**

* Bidders must submit their proposals to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit.
* The bid must include all required information and attachments, as specified in the Tender Documents.

**Integrity Regime:**

* The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime, administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
* Applicants must be prepared to provide information required to facilitate the integrity assessment process.

**Additional Information:**

* Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for identifying Indigenous business capacity.
* Registering a business profile in the IBD may increase visibility and provide opportunities for federal government contracts.

**Tender Documents:**

* The Invitation to Tender (ITT) and Annex “A” – Janitorial Services can be downloaded from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website.

**Contact Information:**

* For information and inquiries, please contact:
	+ Sheena Simonson, Contracting Officer
	+ Email: sheena.simonson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: 306-515-1563
	+ Bid Receiving Unit
	+ 6101 Dewdney Ave, Regina, SK, S4P 3K7, Canada

**Language of Posting:**

* This posting is available in both official languages (English and French). [English | Français]
